original_title: 名奉行 遠山の金さん 美女の陰謀！関八州あばれ旅
overview: The meeting of the two greatest legends in Japan - Magistrate Toyama, the crime-fighting official with the cherry blossom tattoo on his shoulder, and Kunisada Chuji, the yakuza protector of the common man! When a local magistrate is murdered by a group of vagabonds, Toyama is ordered to arrest Kunisada Chuji. In his investigation, he meets Kunisada's wife, who is all too familiar to Toyama, and casts doubt on his guilt. Furthermore, there seems to be a larger conspiracy being carried out...
title: Magistrate Toyama: Conspiracy of a Beautiful Woman! Rampage in Kanhashu
